channel.title: Plugin needed?
channel.description:
Well, I'm trying to polish up my math skills, and I came across this site: www.math.com Normally I like Firefox, but for some reason the workout's dont work (here: http://math.com/school/subject1/practice/S1U4L1/S1U4L1Pract.html ) I fill in the answer and click the button, but nothing happens. So I try it with IE, and it works. So is there something outdated or whatever in my Firefox?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Plugin needed?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

It must be a huge idiot then, because in Firefox the buttons don’t work and in IE some text parts are fucked up.

Read full topic

item.title: Plugin needed?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

I just think that the site had an idiot designer. It’s probably a fault on the site’s side.

Read full topic
